question: Which of the following is an initiative by the government to create viable and widespread channels for sale of products and services produced by Persons with disability (PwD) covered under the National Trust Act?
explanation: Prerna is the marketing assistance scheme launched under the National Trust with an objective to create viable and widespread channels for sale of products and services produced by Persons with disability (PwD) covered under the National Trust Act. This scheme aims at providing funds to participate in events such as exhibitions, melas, fairs, etc. to sell the products made by PwDs. The scheme also provides an incentive to the Registered Organisations (RO) based on the sales turnover of the products made by PwDs.
